content: भव्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भू-कर्तरि नि°यत्] {@--1@} Existing, being, being present. {@--2@} Future, about to be. {@--3@} Likely to become. {@--4@} Suitable, proper, fit, worthy; <ls>Ki. 11. 13.</ls> {@--5@} Good, nice, excellent. {@--6@} Auspicious, fortunate, happy; <ls>Ku. 1. 22</ls>; <ls>Ki. 3. 12</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">10. 51.</ls> {@--7@} Handsome, lovely, beautiful. {@--8@} Calm, tranquil, placid. {@--9@} True. --व्या <ab>N.</ab> of Pārvatī. --व्यं {@--1@} Existence. {@--2@} Future time. {@--3@} Result, fruit. {@--4@} Good result, prosperity; <ls>R. 17. 58.</ls> {@--5@} A bone.
